data.title: 10 most famous Drag Queens in the world and their net worth
data.meta_description: Are you a fan of Drag Race and would like to know who the most famous drag queens are? Check out this article to learn about drag queens and their net worth.
data.text:
Over the years, the cash tips on television series/ films like All Stars and Drag Race have increased significantly. This has benefitted the most famous drag queens, that spend thousands of dollars to get their looks together for the shows.

Today, drag is both global and glam. Thanks to incredible series like Canada's Drag Race, RuPaul's Drag Race, and more that have single-handedly brought drag culture into the mainstream. Drag is an arduous career path for an individual that wants to make huge money. But these most followed drag queens have taken it to another level and are earning well.

Most famous drag queens

The most famous drag queens not on drag race were entertainers that solely performed in specialist clubs and bars. But today, drag queens are recognized for headlining shows and featuring in TV films and series. According to Techie+Gamers, these are the ten most famous drag queens.

1. Ru Paul - $60 million

Who is the most famous RuPaul Queen? According to Forbes, Mama Ru, the producer of RuPaul’s Drag Race is the world’s most famous drag queen. No one else comes close to snatching her crown as the globe's top queen.

The Emmy-winning drag queen has a net worth of $60 million, making her one of the wealthiest, most famous drag queens of the 90s. Ru Paul got her wealth from her studio albums, producing credits, best-selling books, cosmetics lines, and other assorted royalties.

2. Trixie Mattel - $10 million

Trixie is arguably one of the most famous drag queens in history. She’s the perfect rags-to-riches tale; Mattel went from struggling to make ends meet to international fame. Trixie was the winner of RuPaul’s Drag Race season three.

She found her entrepreneurial momentum after leaving the reality show. She has a documentary, and a YouTube channel, recorded several best-selling county music albums, and started a beauty line, Trixie Cosmetics.

3. Bianca Del Rio - $4 million

Bianca Del Rio is a famous drag queen from the 70s because of her foul-mouthed comedy clown. She won Drag Race season six and has visited different parts of the globe with her one-woman standup show.

In 2019, New York magazine ranked her as one of the USA's top most powerful drag queens. In addition to her world tours, Bianca Del Rio has published a book and also features in a Netflix movie, Hurricane Bianca.

4. Alyssa Edwards - $3 million

New York magazine has ranked Alyssa Edwards as the fifth most powerful American drag queen. In addition to her quips, Alyssa is a choreographer and business person. She has also appeared in Miss Gay America content in 2004 and the Netflix documentary Dancing Queen.

5. Chad Michaels - $3 million

Chad's impersonation of Cher is what brought her fame. In 2018, Cher's role won her a slot in the Cher Tribute Concert. Chad also won the first season of the famous RuPaul's Drag Race.

6. Raven – 2 million

David Petruschin, popular as Raven, is a California-born drag queen. She became famous after her appearance on All-Stars season one and Drag Race season two. Her incredible makeup skills on the show saw her become RuPaul's personal makeup artist. She has won a Primetime Emmy for her makeup skills for a multi-camera series.

7. Katya Zamolodchikova - $1.1 million

The most powerful drag queens list can't miss Katya's name. She's one of the prominent names from the Drag Race family and is famous as a podcast host, standup comic, best-selling author, and YouTube star. Katya has respect for speaking candidly about mental health.

8. Shangela Laquifa Wadley - $1 million

Shangela is a Paris, Texan-born drag superstar. She has made several cameos and acting gigs in shows such as Glee, 2 Broke girls and Community. People also love her for her memorable appearance in A Star Is Born. Shangela is currently working with HBO on We’re Here. In addition, she is a singer and regularly tours the world.

9. Latrice Royale - $1 million

Latrice first appeared on season two of RuPaul's Drag Race All-Stars, but her highlight of the competition was in the fourth season. In 2019, New York magazine ranked her among the top drag race competitors. Latrice has an adoring fan base and works as a reality TV personality and a recording artist.

10. Violet Chachki - $750,000

Violet was the winner of Drag Race season seven. Her fans love her because of her iconic fashion and aesthetic references. Besides being a drag queen, she has a successful recording and modeling career.

The most famous drag queens have used a combination of flamboyant approaches to life and wardrobes to become celebrities. However, RuPaul's Drag Race series has given most of them a platform, which has helped them build a following and make more money.

Tuko.co.ke has shared an article on the richest musicians in the world. Today singers and musicians are among the richest people in the world.

They accumulate wealth through music, endorsement, YouTube, and businesses. The wealthiest musicians are worth more than a billion dollars. Read the article to learn more about their incredible lifestyles too.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
